title: Ticket #1675: DAGMan should echo FD limit at startup
description: DAGMan should echo the file descriptor limit (and maybe other limits?) at startup, so that if it runs out of file descriptors we know what its actual environment is, rather than extrapolating based on what we think the environment is.
